package.name: robotiq_s_model_articulated_gazebo_plugins
package.description: The Robotiq gripper gazebo plugins package. Mainly a port from drcsim, to allow real Robotiq gripper control and the plugin to have it work in Gazebo simulation. This package will provide the same interface to the gripper as one would have if they were interfacing with hardware. Porting code from software to reality should be seamless with this ROS interface now.
